76927.作る物の種類を 選んでください。\n<break>:
Please choose what you'd like to cook.
<break>

76928.現在 調理職人レベル<%dL_SYOKUNIN_LV>です。\n何を作りますか？:
Your current Cooking level is Lv. <%dL_SYOKUNIN_LV>.
What do you want to cook?<break>

76930.<%sL_STORAGE_NAME>が いっぱいなので\n調理が できません。<:
<%sL_STORAGE_NAME> is full, so you
cannot cook.
<end>

76932.一度 コツをつかんだレシピは\n『いっぱつしあげ』が できるようになります。\n:
Once you have a knack for a recipe, the "Quick Craft" command becomes available.
Quick Craft allows you to finish the item in no time flat! However, items created this way can never be ★★★ quality.
In addition, the chance of getting a critical hit while using "Craft Normally" has increased slightly!

76933.<%sL_RECIPE>のレシピは\nまだ 覚えていません。<end>:
You don't know the <%sL_RECIPE>
recipe yet.<end>

76934.調理設備がある。\n調理のレシピを 覚えれば\nここで 調理が できそうだ。:
It's a cooking facility.
If you know any cooking recipes, you can cook
here.

76935.そのカテゴリのレシピは\nまだ 覚えていません。<end>:
You don't know any recipes of this category
yet.<end>

76937.<%sL_RECIPE>を 作るには\n<pc>の 調理職人レベルが\n<%nL:
To cook the <%sL_RECIPE>,
your Cooking level must be
Lv. <%dL_HITUYOU_LV> or higher.<end>

76938.調理とは フライパンにのせた 具材を焼いて\n目的のアイテムを 作ることです。\:
Cooking is the process cooking various ingredients on a frying pan to create a variety of dishes.
As you cook each ingredient, its cooked meter will rise. When the meter is full, it is fully cooked and ready to eat.
Be sure that all ingredients are fully cooked, as the quality of the finished dish is determined by how cooked everything is.
Focus is required to use cooking commands, so use your Focus wisely as you cook a dish to completion.
The closer an ingredient is to the center of the pan, the easier it is to cook. Move your ingredients around effectively!
Please note that if you an encounter a connection error or the game closes while cooking, all ingredients will be lost.

76939.調理の遊び方の説明です！\n<br>\n毎ターン 具材を焼く度に\n各具材の 焼:
This will explain Cooking!
As you cook each ingredient, its cooked meter will rise. Do your best to try and fill this meter.
Ingredients that have a full meter are fully cooked and ready to eat.
When all ingredients are fully cooked, use the "Finish" command to finish cooking!
If an ingredient that is fully cooked has its meter filled again, it will burn, so be careful not to overcook your ingredients.
The closer an ingredient is to the center of the frying pan, the more its cooked meter will rise when it is cooked.
Be mindful of your Focus as you cook as you aim to be a top chef!

76940.<%sL_RECIPE>を作るには\n素材が 足りません。<end>:
You don't have enough ingredients to cook the
<%sL_RECIPE>.<end>

76941.調理設備がある。\n調理職人であれば\nここで アイテムが作れそうだ。:
It's a cooking facility.
If you're a cook, you can craft items here.

76942.<speed=0><pc>は 調理のとくぎを\nおぼえていない！:
<speed=0><pc> does not remember the cooking
skill!

76944.調理設備がある。\nフライパンがあれば\nここで 調理が できそうだ。:
It's a cooking facility.
If you have a frying pan, you can cook here.

<speed=0>You can only use Mix 'n' Match on ingredients
of the same type.

The <%sL_SYOKUNIN_TOOL> that
<pc> was using has reached its
limit and is now broken.<end>

76956.調理設備がある。\nここで 料理が作れそうだ。\n<break>:
It's a cooking facility.
You can cook here.
<break>

76962.できのよさ<color_yellow>★★★<color_white>の物は で:
Do you want to quick craft this item you have
a knack for? The item will not have a quality
of <color_yellow>★★★<color_white>.<yesno><close>

78788.ダブルたて返しを使うと \n縦横２マスにある 上下の具材を\n入れ替えることがで:
By using Double Upright, you can swap
2-square ingredients vertically.

78789.ダブルよこ返しを使うと \n縦横２マスにある 左右の具材を\n入れ替えることがで:
By using Double Upright, you can swap
2-square ingredients horizontally.

78791.ななめムーブを使うと\nななめのマスに 具材を移動することができます。:
By using Criss Cross, you can move an
ingredient diagonally.

78792.弱火焼きを使うと\n全てのマスを ４ターンの間\n半分の火力で 焼くことができま:
By using Simmer, all squares will cook at
half strength for 4 turns.

78793.強火焼きを使うと\n全てのマスを ４ターンの間\n強い火力で 焼くことができます:
By using High Heat, all squares will cook
with more strength for 4 turns.

78794.まぜあわせを使うと\n上下左右にある 同じ種類の具材と\n焼き加減を 揃えること:
By using Mix 'n' Match, any adjacent
ingredients that are the same type as the one
chosen will have their cooked level averaged.

78795.ねらい焼きを使うと\n選択したマスを 通常より高い会心率で\n焼くことができます:
When using Critigrill, the selected square
will cook with a higher chance of a critical
hit.

78796.完熱封じを使ったマスは しばらくの間\n何をしても 焼けなくなります。:
By using Burners Off, the selected square will
not cook under any circumstances for a short
while.

78797.たて返しを使うと \n縦２マスにある 上下の具材を\n入れ替えることができます。:
By using Flip Over, you can swap two
vertically-placed ingredients.

78798.トップターンを使うと\n上の列にある具材を 下の列まで\n一気に飛ばすことができ:
The top turn allows the ingredients in the top
row to fly all the way down to the bottom row.

78799.よこ返しを使うと \n横２マスにある 左右の具材を\n入れ替えることができます。:
By using Flip Sideways, you can swap two
ingredients horizontally.

103198.<color_yellow>\n「どうぐかばん」だけでなく 「預かり所」と\n「:
You can now use materials from your storage and house storage in addition to the items in your item bag for Cooking!
When selecting a recipe with materials you don't have on hand, you have the option of using materials from either storage.

113264.会心焼きを使うと\n高温なマスほど 高い会心率で\n焼くことができます。:
When using Hot Stuff, everything in the fry pan will cook. The higher a square's temperature, the more likely it will be a
critical hit.

while.

vertically-placed ingredients and cook them
with a higher chance of a critical hit.
